description:
Whether you’re extending your pro placement or setting an anchor around a tree, this Edelrid sling will be the bestie on your next trip.

  • Made of recycled polyester that is durable to withstand many trips around that trunk
  • A red polyester internal wear indicator lets you know if it’s time to replace it
  • The sewn label gives you a refresh of the inspection procedure to keep you safe on your next project
name: Edelrid 16mm Polyester 3R Sling
